medical_history.chief_complaint: Sharp epigastric and right lower quadrant pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 48 hours prior to presentation, characterized by sharp pain, nausea, decreased oral intake, persistent discomfort affecting sleep, and episodes of diarrhea. No dysuria, fever, or chills reported.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Obesity, labile hypertension, asthma, Hb C trait; past surgical history includes C-sections x 2.
